sect2.title: Setting Up Your Development Environment
sect2.para: Download, install and test the JavaFX Script download bundle.
List items in the JFX Download bundle and where to get them.
Put these items into a JavaFX development directory named development_directory_name.
Set some environment variables. Add development_directory_name to your path.

sect2.title: Write Your First JavaFX Script
sect2.para: Open a text editor, write a script, save it.
From the terminal window, use jfx command to compile the script. It calls wrapper packages, links to the JRE, and generates an output class.

sect2.title: Run your first JavaFX Script
sect2.para: Use jfx command to run this script on your desktop.
